statements: UPDATE transaction_logs SET operation='CREATE', details='New user registered' WHERE log_id=101;
UPDATE transaction_logs SET timestamp='2022-09-15 12:30:00', user_id=105, details='User profile updated' WHERE log_id=202;
UPDATE transaction_logs SET operation = 'login', details = 'User logged in successfully' WHERE user_id = 123 AND log_id = 1;
UPDATE transaction_logs SET details = 'User updated profile information', operation = 'update', timestamp = NOW() WHERE log_id = 3;
UPDATE transaction_logs SET amount = 100.50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE audit_trails SET event_description = 'Transaction completed' WHERE log_id = 1;
UPDATE transaction_logs SET amount = 1500.75, transaction_type = 'Purchase' WHERE id = 100
UPDATE audit_trails SET event_description = 'User made a large purchase', event_type = 'Action' WHERE log_id = 200
UPDATE TransactionLog SET quantity = 10 WHERE transaction_id = 123;
UPDATE EcommerceOperation SET status = 'Completed' WHERE operation_id = 456;
UPDATE TransactionLog SET quantity = 10 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE EcommerceOperation SET status = 'Completed' WHERE operation_id = 2002;
UPDATE transactions SET total_amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 'T1001';
UPDATE audit_logs SET action_description = 'User logged in' WHERE log_id = 101;
UPDATE transactions SET total_amount = total_amount + 50 WHERE transaction_id = '12345';
UPDATE order_details SET quantity = quantity - 1, price = price * 0.9 WHERE order_id = '67890' AND product_id = 'ABC123';
UPDATE transaction_logs SET amount = 1500.00 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email = 'updated_email@example.com', role = 'admin' WHERE id = 5;
